gettingWrongSometimes:
Assalamu alaikum! My name is Ansari. I can help you with your questions about Islam.
I still get things wrong sometimes. It is always best to consult a real Islamic Scholar.

flaggingInstructions.desktop: If I say anything wrong, confusing, great, funny or interesting, please e-mail <1>{{email}}</1>.

multilingualMessage.desktop: I am multilingual. I can understand Arabic (including transliteration), Bahasa, Bosnian, French Turkish, Urdu and many other languages.

comprehensiveGuide: Click <1>here</1> for a more comprehensive guide to what Ansari can do.
newConversationConfirmation: Are you certain that you want to begin a new conversation?
conversationLostWarning: Please note that the previous conversation will be lost.
backendErrorMessage: Something went wrong. If this issue persists please contact us through our help center at <1>{{email}}</1>
subscribe: <1>Subscribe</1> to our mailing list for updates!
cantChangeLanguageWhileAnsariWritingAler: You can't change language before get Ansari response
